trans-unit.target: TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>The House Manderville alchemist can readjust your Manderville weaponry attributes.
TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_MANDERVILALCHEMIST_000_001<tab>If you are unhappy with your armament's properties or simply wish to experiment, I shall gladly readjust its aetherial pathways for you.
TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_A1_000_100<tab>Readjust the attributes of your Manderville weaponry.
TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_A2_000_100<tab>Learn about readjusting Manderville weaponry attributes.

TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>The three attributes you added to your Manderville weaponry can be reselected or rebalanced. As with the initial augmentation, one of these attributes will be set to a lower value than the other two.

TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_SYSTEM_100_010<tab>The three attributes you added to your Manderville weaponry can be reselected or rebalanced. As with the previous augmentation, one of these attributes will be set to a lower value than the other two.
TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>Once you have readjusted the values to your liking, select “Confirm” to finalize your decision.
TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>Resetting your weaponry's attributes will require an additional chunk of amplifying achondrite, so consider your choices carefully.
TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_SYSTEM_100_012<tab>Resetting your weaponry's attributes will require an additional chunk of cosmic crystallite, so consider your choices carefully.

TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_SYSTEM_100_013<tab>The weaponry you currently have equipped is not eligible for readjustment. You must equip the Manderville weaponry you wish to readjust before speaking with the House Manderville alchemist.
TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_MANDERVILALCHEMIST_000_020<tab>Ahem, do you happen to have any more achondrite stashed away? A single chunk is all I require, but it is a rather crucial element...
TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>Chunks of amplifying achondrite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_MANDERVILALCHEMIST_100_020<tab>Ahem, do you happen to have any more crystallite stashed away? A single chunk is all I require, but it is a rather crucial element...
TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_SYSTEM_100_021<tab>Chunks of cosmic crystallite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.

TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_MANDERVILALCHEMIST_000_030<tab>I'm sorry, but I'm afraid the readjustment process is only available for Manderville weaponry. If you might equip suitable armaments before we begin...?

TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_MANDERVILALCHEMIST_000_040<tab>There we are: perfectly adjusted to your newly stated preferences. Should you have further need of my alchemical manipulations, I shall be stationed here in the High Crucible for the foreseeable future.

TEXT_CHRHDY399_04784_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Your Manderville weaponry (<var 08 E3E94509 ((<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E94513 ((<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>) has been readjusted.
